website_summaries.verdict: One of the bigger griddles, created to bring outdoor flavor indoors.
pros: Offers 3-in-1 cooking: indoor grill, griddle, and bacon cooker
Offers 100 square inches of cooking space
Interchangeable grill and griddle plates allow for smoky flavor typically associated with outdoor cooking
Engineered to control smoke from all facets
We love that you can clean the plates in the dishwasher
cons: There are some complaints regarding messy grease

customer_reviews.title: Way better than a Foreman grill!
customer_reviews.text: Best indoor grill I have ever owned. Will only fit four burgers if you get a common 1/5 or 1/4 pound patty. More room than any other one I have used and SOOOOO easy to clean. Controlling the temp is nice as well if you are needing to speed up or delay the finish time. This grill can take a 20% fat burger and make is not greasy, but still super moist. I put 4 frozen patties on with some zesty italian dressing and let it work for about 7 minutes. Done and tastes GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Knight

customer_reviews.title: Nice size - nice features!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a replacement product for an aging Foreman grill. After using it for a few months we are quite satisfied with it. It's typically used to grill chicken or burgers and will easily accommodate 4 portions. The temperature setting and removable grill plates are convenient as well and a nice additional to what we are used to. The drip pan is hidden underneath and hides the mess while cooking, so much so that a few times I have almost forgot to empty it. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a clam-shell style indoor grill.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce F

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: For the price and set up its a nice unit. A few things keep it from being 5 stars. First is a nesuance, the plug is to short to make it really counter friendly. The indicator lights arent clear enough and bright enough to tell if its ready or not. Really needs better temperature controls. Pros Lays flat for those looking to use as a skillet option for like bacon. Or flat cooker for like meats. The plats are removable for easy clean, and are non stick. Wish it offered other plats for diffrent cook configurations. Easy clean, and the grease collection is pretty efficient. All and all an solid inside gril for the money.

Great overall size that fits on my counter well. Picture is misleading on size. They would have to be tiny slider type burgers to fit 6 on it. It fits 4 average size frozen store bought patties on it perfectly, Actual inner cooking surface is 11" x 10" Cord is a tad short for my taste. Drip pan is shallow & have to keep an eye on it. Doesn't have a built in timer dial/on off like past HB models.
customer_reviews.author: Oregonized

customer_reviews.title: Where's the Beef?
customer_reviews.text: This is my second HB indoor grill. The first one came with grilling and temperature instructions which were greatly appreciated. This one, I like, especially because you can clean it in the dishwasher, came with no instructions whatsoever. I purchased it a couple of months ago, but used it for the first time this week. I was surprised there we no temperature suggestions for my steak like the last HB grill. One would think a company like Hamilton Beach would include instructions with all its products. And good luck finding a customer service number!
customer_reviews.author: Craige .

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to stove/oven
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I love to grill but live in a small apartment with limited outdoor space. You don't get the same smoky/fire taste that comes with grilling food, but this is a great alternative to cooking stovetop or in the oven. The double sides makes cooking chicken or other meats super easy and quick and the drain helps a lot for marinated foods. It's also nice because you can open it up fully and cook your veggies on the flat top side and your meats on the grill side. After you're done it's amazingly easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great--the manual could benefit by including recommended temperatures for different foods.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Good Grill,Bad Drip Tray
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the grill since I have had it.Super easy to clean with the plates being removeable and nonstick.The only bugaboo is for some reason the drip tray cracked,which created a mess on the counter.Had to order a new one from Hamilton Beach.The cost was reasonable but the shipping charges were outrageous.I can not believe an item that weighs a couple of ounces cost twelve dollars to ship.It is what it is I guess.
customer_reviews.author: LLOYD HARRISON

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easier to clean
customer_reviews.text: Had to give this grill a full 5 stars , easy to use and easier to clean , solid well built and cooks bacon perfect , great for use in a motorhome no grease splatter I'm sure it has many uses but bacon alone is worth getting
customer_reviews.author: Tod Evans

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product for its versatility and price.
customer_reviews.text: Big improvement over it's earlier version. It now offers a tilt position to drain bacon fat, etc. into it's drain pan which is easy to clean. The baking plates are very easy to remove or to clean with a paper towel. Heats up quickly to its highest temperature. My only complaint which I noticed in other reviews is it's power cord is too short. An extension cord would solve the problem but must be rated to handle the high current. That should be an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 3-in-1 Indoor Grill and Electric Griddle Combo and Bacon Cooker, Opens 180 Degrees to Double Cooking Space, Removable Nonstick Grids, (25600)
product_meta.description: Style Name:3-in-1 Multi Grill, Griddle, BaconSteak and eggs may seem like a treat reserved for breakfast at your favorite local diner, but the Hamilton Beach 3-in-1 MultiGrill gives you the flexibility to make this breakfast favorite easily at home. With the convenience of a grill surface, a flat griddle space and a bacon cooker, just the thought of what you can create might make getting out of bed in the morning a bit easier. But why stop at breakfast? The 3-in-1 MultiGrill is versatile enough to make a panini for lunch and juicy burgers, fish or chicken for dinner. Keep it closed for locking in flavors or cooking bacon, or open it flat to double the cooking space and use the griddle option. With a 200 square inch nonstick cooking surface, there's enough room to cook for the family or grill multiple items at once. The adjustable temperature control allows for cooking at low or high heat settings.
feature_bullets: 3 in 1 cooking versatility: indoor BBQ grill, grill/griddle, and bacon cooker. Cook burgers, chicken, steak, fish or vegetables just like you would on a traditional grill or open 180 degrees to make eggs, pancakes and bacon for breakfast.

Easy, no mess bacon cooker: make your bacon crispy and delicious without any messy splatters and no Turning. Just flip the kickstand to elevate the grill for easy bacon cooking and better grease drainage and delicious results.
Serves up to 6 or more: family sized 100 square inch surface can grill up to 6 servings at once or double the size by opening flat so you can grill on one side and griddle on the other.
Adjustable temperature control: allows for cooking at low or high heat settings Up to 400 degrees. The preheat light will come on when the unit is heated.
Cooks more than steaks, BBQ and burgers: grill bacon, chicken, fish, pizza, vegetables, fruit and more. Use the griddle plate for eggs, pancakes, or French toast. Also great for Paleo and keto diets.
Easy to clean: the nonstick plates and drip tray are removable for easy, dishwasher safe cleaning.
